ratings.en: Are fuka yo gensaku ga aru janaikane
Fuji ni tsukimis么 wa machigatte iru
Hiji ni mo makezu hiza ni mo makezu
Hitori no bunkajin ga rash么mon no shita de ama yadori shiteita/Namayasuhashi wo yakaneba naranu
Kamei no kokuhaku/Aru asa gureb么ru zamuza ga me wo samasu to mikoshi wo katsuide ita
Mi no take kurabe/Shimi to dokudashi
Nantaru meiwaku de aru koto ka!
Sono kuni wo tobi koshite koi
Watashi wa shukumei teki ni hikage mono de aru
